title: Clone!

meta.alt_txt: gain a copy of the next card of that type to be played by somebody else
meta.double_alt_txt: gain a copy of the next {!e card_get_meta_num {fusion} cl_amt} cards of that type to be played by somebody else
meta.player_alt_txt: copy a card from your target's hand while prioritizing the chosen card type
meta.ext_txt: Can only copy Common and Special cards.

desc:
[cl]

Choose a card type. Gain a copy of the next card of that type to be played by somebody else.

-# Can only copy Common and Special cards.
